content.question: The image most strongly supports the argument that Reconstruction

choices.label: led to the unfair punishment of White Southerners by the North
encouraged large-scale rebellions by former slaves
involved unconstitutional abuses of government power
temporarily altered race relations in the South

content.answer: temporarily altered race relations in the South
